recipe.title: Grilled Tricolor Peppers
ingredients: 1 green bell pepper, cored, seeded and sliced into strips
1 yellow bell pepper, cored, seeded and sliced into strips
1 red bell pepper, cored, seeded and sliced into strips
1 large Vidalia onion, sliced into strips
instructions: Coat grill with cooking spray and heat on high. Toss bell peppers, onion, oil, salt and pepper in a bowl. Grill, turning occasionally, until vegetables soften, about 15 minutes. Serve immediately.
